package.name: Legacy Tube
package.shortDescription: A youtube client for Legacy devices.

descriptionlist.description: This is a youtube clent for legacy devices that will be taking a lot from the 3ds homebrew "Forth Tube" that is made for the 3ds family of consoles. it's still a work in progress and this is just a side hobby :)
If I get older ios devices and I'm still working on this, I will add more version support.
